document_name: Prodoc - BXL15122010 - KYR Febr2011 - rev for addendum.doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KGZ/00061642/Prodoc - BXL15122010 - KYR Febr2011 - rev for addendum.doc

outputs.output_descr:
Public policy strengthened in the areas of human rights, anti-corruption and rule of law. Institutional capacity of Parliament strengthened to better perform legislative, representational and oversight roles
1) Laws and by-laws aligned with the new Constitution, national and international commitments
2) Implementation of a new legal framework improved via better oversight  over the Executive, public finance, national and sectoral reform plans, national and international laws 
3) Institutional capacity of selected governmental institutions strengthened in order to meet requirements of the new parliamentary governance system.

project_descr: Institutional support to implementation of a New Legal Framework in the Kyrgyz Republic
